title: The Bee-Man of Orn
description: The Bee-Man lives humbly and contentedly until a Junior Sorcerer happens by with some disturbing news: the Bee-man, he says, has been transformed--he once was someone (or something) entirely different. But who? Or what? A giant or a prince? A dog or a dragon? The now restless Bee-man sets out on a quest to discover the answer.
author: Frank R. Stockton
